title: Run Enterprise Features Database Migration
description: Run the enterprise features database migration in Supabase to create all required tables for features A-H

instructions.details: Go to https://supabase.com/dashboard and select the Elevate For Humanity project
Click 'SQL Editor' in the left sidebar, then click 'New Query'
Open the file 'migrations/enterprise_features.sql' in the repository and copy ALL contents
Paste the SQL into the Supabase SQL Editor and click 'Run' (or press Cmd/Ctrl + Enter)

You should see a success message. The migration creates 8 tables: video_chapters, video_transcripts, funding_applications, user_streaks, xapi_statements, certificates, program_holder_notes, ai_generated_courses
In Supabase, go to 'Table Editor' and confirm you can see the new tables listed

verification.query: SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = 'public' AND table_name IN ('video_chapters', 'video_transcripts', 'funding_applications', 'user_streaks', 'xapi_statements', 'certificates', 'program_holder_notes', 'ai_generated_courses');
verification.expected_result: Should return 8 rows with the table names
